# pause()

**Instance Method**

Pauses playback of the current entry.

## Declaration

```swift
func pause()
```

## Discussion

If playback isn’t currently underway, this method has no effect. To resume playback of the current entry from the pause point, call the [doc://com.apple.MusicKit/documentation/MusicKit/MusicPlayer/play()] method.
title: pause()
